title: Fonts used in this logo
content:
Can anybody help me to know what fonts is used in this logo?

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091115190942/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_55.jpg) | 78.8 KB |
author: kan4

comments.content:
Hi Marius,  
which logo?

#1 is [Lucida Big Casual](http://web.archive.org/web/20091115190942/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/lucida-big-casual/) aka [Textile](http://web.archive.org/web/20091115190942/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/textile/).

#2 is a slanted [Britannic](http://web.archive.org/web/20091115190942/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/britannic_ot/).

#3 looks a lot like [Berling](http://web.archive.org/web/20091115190942/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/berling/alternate_cuts.html), only the ‘K’ is off – maybe customized.

F
